html:
<div class="comment-uk-football__wrapper"><style>/**
 * An example of a colour palette to be used with guss-colours
 *
 * If you're looking for the guardian colour palette: https://github.com/guardian/pasteup-palette
 * 
 * @type Map
 *
 * @group colours
 */
/**
 * Get a colour from a given colour palette.
 * 
 * @param {String} $name                    - colour to get
 * @param {Map}    $palette ($guss-colours) - palette
 *
 * @requires {variable} guss-colours
 *
 * @return {Color | Null}
 *
 * @group colours
 */
/**
 * Generate helper classes for a given colour palette  
 * Outputs rules such as: `.c-red { color: red; }`.
 *
 * @param {Map}    $palette  ($guss-colours) - palette
 * @param {String} $prefix   ("c-")          - prefix
 * @param {String} $property ("color")       - property
 *
 * @requires {variable} guss-colours
 *
 * @group colours
 */
/**
 * Data font stack
 *
 * @group typography
 */
/**
 * Serif font stack
 *
 * @group typography
 */
/**
 * Headline font stack
 *
 * @group typography
 */
/**
 * Sans serif text font stack
 *
 * @group typography
 */
/**
 * Sans serif headline font stack
 *
 * @group typography
 */
/**
 * Default font scale settings
 * See font-scale.html and font-scale.png for visual representations
 *
 * @group typography
 */
/**
 * Grab all levels of a font the font-scale
 *
 * @param {String} $name - Name of the font-scale matrix (eg: headline)
 * @param {Map} $font-scale ($font-scale)
 *
 * @example
 *  font-size: get-scale(header);
 *
 * @requires {variable} $font-scale
 *
 * @return {Map}
 *
 * @group typography
 */
/**
 * Grab info for a particular level of a font-scale
 *
 * @param {String} $name - Name of the font-scale in the matrix (eg: headline)
 * @param {Number} $level - Level in the matrix
 * @param {Map} $font-scale ($font-scale)
 *
 * @example
 *  font-size: get-scale-level(header, 1);
 *
 * @requires {variable} $font-scale
 * @requires {function} get-scale
 *
 * @return {Map}
 *
 * @group typography
 */
/**
 * Get a font-size for a level in the font-scale matrix
 *
 * @param {String} $name - Name of the font-scale in the matrix (eg: headline)
 * @param {Number} $level - Level in the matrix
 * @param {Map} $font-scale - Configuration
 *
 * @example
 *  font-size: get-font-size(header, 3);
 *
 * @requires {variable} $font-scale
 * @requires {function} convert-to-px
 * @requires {function} get-scale-level
 *
 * @return {Number}
 *
 * @group typography
 */
/**
 * Get a line-height for a level in the font-scale matrix
 *
 * @param {String} $name - Name of the font-scale in the matrix (eg: headline)
 * @param {Number} $level - Level in the matrix
 * @param {Map} $font-scale - Configuration
 *
 * @example
 *  font-size: get-line-height(header, 3);
 *
 * @requires {variable} $font-scale
 * @requires {function} convert-to-px
 * @requires {function} get-scale-level
 *
 * @return {Number}
 *
 * @group typography
 */
/**
 * Turn any value into pixels
 *
 * @param {Number} $value
 *
 * @example
 *  font-size: convert-to-px(14); // 14px
 *
 * @return {Number}
 *
 * @group typography
 */
/**
 * Default typography settings, to be included as soon as possible in the HTML
 * 1. Make type rendering look crisper
 * 2. Set relative line spacing to 1.5 (16px * 1.5 = 24px)
 *
 * @param {String} $font-family ($f-serif-text) - Default global font
 *
 * @requires {variable} $f-serif-text
 *
 * @group typography
 */
/**
 * Font-size and line-height shorthand
 *
 * @param {Number} $size
 * @param {Number} $line-height ($size)
 *
 * @example
 *  @include font-size(18, 24);
 *
 * @requires {function} convert-to-px
 *
 * @group typography
 */
/**
 * Font styling shorthand  
 * Note: prefer the usage of the font-scale mixins to stick to the font scale
 *
 * @param {String} $family
 * @param {String} $weight
 * @param {Number} $size
 * @param {Number} $line-height ($size)
 *
 * @example
 *  @include font(arial, bold, 18, 24);
 *
 * @requires {mixin} font-size
 *
 * @group typography
 */
/**
 * Header family and weight properties.
 *
 * @requires {variable} $f-serif-headline
 *
 * @group typography
 */
/**
 * Header typography settings.
 *
 * @param {Number} $level
 * @param {Boolean} $size-only
 *
 * @example
 *  // Output all properties (font-size, line-height, family, weight)
 *  @include fs-header(3);
 *  
 *  // Output font-size and line-height only
 *  @include fs-header(3, $size-only: true);
 *
 * @requires {function} get-font-size
 * @requires {function} get-line-height
 * @requires {mixin} font-size
 * @requires {mixin} f-header
 *
 * @group typography
 */
/**
 * Healdine family and weight properties.
 *
 * @requires {variable} $f-serif-headline
 *
 * @group typography
 */
/**
 * Headline typography settings.
 *
 * @param {Number} $level
 * @param {Boolean} $size-only
 *
 * @example
 *  // Output all properties (font-size, line-height, family, weight)
 *  @include fs-headline(3);
 *  
 *  // Output font-size and line-height only
 *  @include fs-headline(3, $size-only: true);
 *
 * @requires {function} get-font-size
 * @requires {function} get-line-height
 * @requires {mixin} font-size
 * @requires {mixin} f-headline
 *
 * @group typography
 */
/**
 * Body Heading family and weight properties.
 *
 * @requires {variable} $f-serif-text
 *
 * @group typography
 */
/**
 * Body Heading typography settings.
 *
 * @param {Number} $level
 * @param {Boolean} $size-only
 *
 * @example
 *  // Output all properties (font-size, line-height, family, weight)
 *  @include fs-bodyHeading(3);
 *  
 *  // Output font-size and line-height only
 *  @include fs-bodyHeading(3, $size-only: true);
 *
 * @requires {function} get-font-size
 * @requires {function} get-line-height
 * @requires {mixin} font-size
 * @requires {mixin} f-bodyHeading
 *
 * @group typography
 */
/**
 * Body Copy family property.
 *
 * @requires {variable} $f-serif-text
 *
 * @group typography
 */
/**
 * Body Copy typography settings.
 *
 * @param {Number} $level
 * @param {Boolean} $size-only
 *
 * @example
 *  // Output all properties (font-size, line-height, family)
 *  @include fs-bodyCopy(3);
 *  
 *  // Output font-size and line-height only
 *  @include fs-bodyCopy(3, $size-only: true);
 *
 * @requires {function} get-font-size
 * @requires {function} get-line-height
 * @requires {mixin} font-size
 * @requires {mixin} f-bodyCopy
 *
 * @group typography
 */
/**
 * Data family property.
 *
 * @requires {variable} $f-data
 *
 * @group typography
 */
/**
 * Data typography settings.
 *
 * @param {Number} $level
 * @param {Boolean} $size-only
 *
 * @example
 *  // Output all properties (font-size, line-height, family)
 *  @include fs-data(3);
 *  
 *  // Output font-size and line-height only
 *  @include fs-data(3, $size-only: true);
 *
 * @requires {function} get-font-size
 * @requires {function} get-line-height
 * @requires {mixin} font-size
 * @requires {mixin} f-data
 *
 * @group typography
 */
/**
 * Text Sans family property.
 *
 * @requires {variable} $f-sans-serif-text
 *
 * @group typography
 */
/**
 * Text Sans typography settings.
 *
 * @param {Number} $level
 * @param {Boolean} $size-only
 *
 * @example
 *  // Output all properties (font-size, line-height, family)
 *  @include fs-textSans(3);
 *  
 *  // Output font-size and line-height only
 *  @include fs-textSans(3, $size-only: true);
 *
 * @requires {function} get-font-size
 * @requires {function} get-line-height
 * @requires {mixin} font-size
 * @requires {mixin} f-textSans
 *
 * @group typography
 */
/**
 * Headline Sans family property.  
 * Is not currently integrated into our font scale matrix,
 * hence no `fs-` mixin; currently we're just using it as a
 * replacement font in a few places.
 *
 * @requires {variable} $f-sans-serif-headline
 *
 * @group typography
 */
/**
 * Default colour palette
 *
 * @type Map
 *
 * @group colours
 */
#comment-uk-football {
  background-color: #eae8e3; }
  #comment-uk-football .fc-item {
    background-color: #eae8e3; }

.comment-uk-football__wrapper {
  width: 100%;
  background-color: #eae8e3;
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
  font-family: 'Guardian Egyptian Web', Georgia, serif; }

.comment-uk-football__wrapper {
  width: 100%;
  background-color: #eae8e3;
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden; }
  @media all and (min-width: 46.25em) {
    .comment-uk-football__wrapper {
      border-top: 1px solid #e6711b;
      padding-top: 4px;
      padding-left: 20px;
      padding-right: 20px; } }

.comment-uk-football__content, .comment-uk-football__article {
  position: relative;
  width: 36%;
  font-family: "Guardian Egyptian Web","Guardian Text Egyptian Web",Georgia,serif;
  float: left; }
  @media all and (min-width: 46.25em) {
    .comment-uk-football__content, .comment-uk-football__article {
      height: 148px; } }

.comment-uk-football__title {
  color: #ffffff;
  font-size: 20px;
  line-height: 24px;
  font-weight: 500; }
  @media all and (min-width: 46.25em) {
    .comment-uk-football__title {
      font-size: 26px;
      line-height: 30px;
      font-weight: 200;
      color: #e6711b; } }
  @media all and (min-width: 61.25em) {
    .comment-uk-football__title {
      font-size: 30px;
      line-height: 30px; } }
  @media all and (min-width: 71.25em) {
    .comment-uk-football__title {
      font-size: 36px;
      line-height: 36px; } }
  @media all and (min-width: 81.25em) {
    .comment-uk-football__title {
      font-size: 40px;
      line-height: 40px; } }
  @media all and (max-width: 46.24em) {
    .comment-uk-football__title br {
      display: none; } }

.comment-uk-football__standfirst {
  font-size: 16px;
  line-height: 20px; }
  @media all and (min-width: 46.25em) {
    .comment-uk-football__standfirst {
      font-weight: 200; } }
  @media all and (min-width: 61.25em) {
    .comment-uk-football__standfirst {
      font-size: 20px;
      line-height: 24px; } }
  @media all and (min-width: 71.25em) {
    .comment-uk-football__standfirst {
      font-size: 28px;
      line-height: 32px; } }

@media all and (max-width: 46.24em) {
  .comment-uk-football__content, .comment-uk-football__article, .comment-uk-football__contributors__wrapper {
    width: 100%;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    padding: 0 20px;
    float: none; } }
@media all and (max-width: 29.99em) {
  .comment-uk-football__content, .comment-uk-football__article, .comment-uk-football__contributors__wrapper {
    padding: 0 10px; } }

@media all and (min-width: 41.25em) and (max-width: 46.24em) {
  .comment-uk-football__content .comment-uk-football__title, .comment-uk-football__standfirst, .comment-uk-football__contributors__wrapper {
    max-width: 620px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-left: 0; } }

@media all and (max-width: 46.24em) {
  .comment-uk-football__content {
    padding-bottom: 16px;
    background-color: #e6711b;
    color: #333; } }

.button.comment-uk-football__button {
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  color: #ffffff;
  border: 1px solid #e6711b;
  background-color: #e6711b; }
  @media all and (max-width: 46.24em) {
    .button.comment-uk-football__button {
      display: none; } }
  .button.comment-uk-football__button:hover {
    border-color: #ba5a14;
    background-color: #ba5a14; }
  .button.comment-uk-football__button .comment-uk-football__button__icon path {
    fill: #ffffff; }

.comment-uk-football__button__icon {
  display: inline-block;
  vertical-align: middle;
  margin-left: 2px; }
  .comment-uk-football__button__icon path {
    fill: #e6711b; }

.comment-uk-football__article, .comment-uk-football__link--mobile {
  display: none; }
  .comment-uk-football__article .comment-uk-football__title, .comment-uk-football__link--mobile .comment-uk-football__title {
    color: #333;
    font-family: "Guardian Egyptian Web","Guardian Text Egyptian Web",Georgia,serif;
    font-size: 16px;
    line-height: 20px; }
    @media all and (min-width: 30em) {
      .comment-uk-football__article .comment-uk-football__title, .comment-uk-football__link--mobile .comment-uk-football__title {
        font-size: 20px;
        line-height: 24px; } }
    @media all and (min-width: 61.25em) {
      .comment-uk-football__article .comment-uk-football__title, .comment-uk-football__link--mobile .comment-uk-football__title {
        font-size: 28px;
        line-height: 32px; } }
    .comment-uk-football__article .comment-uk-football__title:before, .comment-uk-football__link--mobile .comment-uk-football__title:before {
      content: "";
      display: inline-block;
      width: 1.25em;
      height: 0.7em;
      margin-right: 0.1em;
      vertical-align: baseline;
      background-size: contain;
      background-image: url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,);
      background-repeat: no-repeat;
      background-position: 0 0; }
    .comment-uk-football__article .comment-uk-football__title .comment-uk-football__byline, .comment-uk-football__link--mobile .comment-uk-football__title .comment-uk-football__byline {
      display: block;
      color: #e6711b; }
  .comment-uk-football__article .comment-uk-football__tagline, .comment-uk-football__link--mobile .comment-uk-football__tagline {
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 0;
    padding-right: 40px;
    margin-bottom: 0;
    color: #767676;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 18px; }
    @media all and (min-width: 61.25em) {
      .comment-uk-football__article .comment-uk-football__tagline, .comment-uk-football__link--mobile .comment-uk-football__tagline {
        font-size: 16px;
        line-height: 20px;
        padding-right: 80px; } }

@media all and (max-width: 46.24em) {
  .comment-uk-football__contributors__wrapper {
    -ms-overflow-style: none;
    overflow-x: scroll;
    overflow-x: -moz-scrollbars-none;
    -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch; }
    .comment-uk-football__contributors__wrapper::-webkit-scrollbar {
      display: none; } }
@media all and (min-width: 46.25em) {
  .comment-uk-football__contributors__wrapper {
    position: relative;
    width: 64%;
    float: left;
    height: 156px; } }

.comment-uk-football__contributors {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  list-style: none; }
  @media all and (max-width: 46.24em) {
    .comment-uk-football__contributors {
      width: 440%; } }
  @media all and (max-width: 29.99em) {
    .comment-uk-football__contributors {
      width: 400%; } }
  @media all and (min-width: 46.25em) {
    .comment-uk-football__contributors {
      position: absolute;
      bottom: 0;
      right: 0;
      width: 100%;
      float: right; } }

.comment-uk-football__contributor {
  line-height: 0;
  float: left;
  position: relative;
  width: 20%; }
  @media all and (max-width: 46.24em) {
    .comment-uk-football__contributor {
      height: 160px;
      overflow: hidden; } }
  @media all and (max-width: 19.99em) {
    .comment-uk-football__contributor img {
      height: 80%;
      right: -18%; } }
  @media all and (max-width: 29.99em) {
    .comment-uk-football__contributor img {
      height: 100%;
      right: -20%; } }
  @media all and (max-width: 46.24em) {
    .comment-uk-football__contributor img {
      position: absolute;
      right: -8%;
      bottom: -10%;
      width: auto;
      height: 120%; } }
  @media all and (min-width: 46.25em) {
    .comment-uk-football__contributor img {
      height: 160px;
      margin-bottom: -12px; } }
  @media all and (min-width: 61.25em) {
    .comment-uk-football__contributor img {
      height: 200px; } }

.comment-uk-football__link--daniel-taylor:hover ~ .comment-uk-football__article--daniel-taylor {
  display: block; }
.comment-uk-football__link--daniel-taylor:hover ~ .comment-uk-football__content {
  display: none; }
.comment-uk-football__link--daniel-taylor:hover ~ .comment-uk-football__contributors__wrapper .comment-uk-football__contributor--daniel-taylor {
  -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
  filter: grayscale(100%); }
.comment-uk-football__link--daniel-taylor:hover ~ .comment-uk-football__contributors__wrapper .comment-uk-football__contributor--david-conn {
  -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
  filter: grayscale(100%); }
.comment-uk-football__link--daniel-taylor:hover ~ .comment-uk-football__contributors__wrapper .comment-uk-football__contributor--amy-lawrence {
  -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
  filter: grayscale(100%); }
.comment-uk-football__link--daniel-taylor:hover ~ .comment-uk-football__contributors__wrapper .comment-uk-football__contributor--barry-glendenning {
  -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
  filter: grayscale(100%); }
.comment-uk-football__link--daniel-taylor:hover ~ .comment-uk-football__contributors__wrapper .comment-uk-football__contributor--barney-ronay {
  -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
  filter: grayscale(100%); }
.comment-uk-football__link--daniel-taylor:hover ~ .comment-uk-football__contributors__wrapper .comment-uk-football__contributor--daniel-taylor {
  -webkit-filter: none;
  filter: none; }

.comment-uk-football__link--david-conn:hover ~ .comment-uk-football__article--david-conn {
  display: block; }
.comment-uk-football__link--david-conn:hover ~ .comment-uk-football__content {
  display: none; }
.comment-uk-football__link--david-conn:hover ~ .comment-uk-football__contributors__wrapper .comment-uk-football__contributor--daniel-taylor {
  -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
  filter: grayscale(100%); }
.comment-uk-football__link--david-conn:hover ~ .comment-uk-football__contributors__wrapper .comment-uk-football__contributor--david-conn {
  -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
  filter: grayscale(100%); }
.comment-uk-football__link--david-conn:hover ~ .comment-uk-football__contributors__wrapper .comment-uk-football__contributor--amy-lawrence {
  -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
  filter: grayscale(100%); }
.comment-uk-football__link--david-conn:hover ~ .comment-uk-football__contributors__wrapper .comment-uk-football__contributor--barry-glendenning {
  -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
  filter: grayscale(100%); }
.comment-uk-football__link--david-conn:hover ~ .comment-uk-football__contributors__wrapper .comment-uk-football__contributor--barney-ronay {
  -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
  filter: grayscale(100%); }
.comment-uk-football__link--david-conn:hover ~ .comment-uk-football__contributors__wrapper .comment-uk-football__contributor--david-conn {
  -webkit-filter: none;
  filter: none; }

.comment-uk-football__link--amy-lawrence:hover ~ .comment-uk-football__article--amy-lawrence {
  display: block; }
.comment-uk-football__link--amy-lawrence:hover ~ .comment-uk-football__content {
  display: none; }
.comment-uk-football__link--amy-lawrence:hover ~ .comment-uk-football__contributors__wrapper .comment-uk-football__contributor--daniel-taylor {
  -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
  filter: grayscale(100%); }
.comment-uk-football__link--amy-lawrence:hover ~ .comment-uk-football__contributors__wrapper .comment-uk-football__contributor--david-conn {
  -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
  filter: grayscale(100%); }
.comment-uk-football__link--amy-lawrence:hover ~ .comment-uk-football__contributors__wrapper .comment-uk-football__contributor--amy-lawrence {
  -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
  filter: grayscale(100%); }
.comment-uk-football__link--amy-lawrence:hover ~ .comment-uk-football__contributors__wrapper .comment-uk-football__contributor--barry-glendenning {
  -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
  filter: grayscale(100%); }
.comment-uk-football__link--amy-lawrence:hover ~ .comment-uk-football__contributors__wrapper .comment-uk-football__contributor--barney-ronay {
  -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
  filter: grayscale(100%); }
.comment-uk-football__link--amy-lawrence:hover ~ .comment-uk-football__contributors__wrapper .comment-uk-football__contributor--amy-lawrence {
  -webkit-filter: none;
  filter: none; }

.comment-uk-football__link--barry-glendenning:hover ~ .comment-uk-football__article--barry-glendenning {
  display: block; }

  filter: grayscale(100%); }

  -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
  filter: grayscale(100%); }
.comment-uk-football__link--barry-glendenning:hover ~ .comment-uk-football__contributors__wrapper .comment-uk-football__contributor--barry-glendenning {
  -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
  filter: grayscale(100%); }
.comment-uk-football__link--barry-glendenning:hover ~ .comment-uk-football__contributors__wrapper .comment-uk-football__contributor--barney-ronay {
  -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
  filter: grayscale(100%); }

  -webkit-filter: none;
  filter: none; }

  display: block; }

  filter: grayscale(100%); }

  filter: grayscale(100%); }
.comment-uk-football__link--barney-ronay:hover ~ .comment-uk-football__contributors__wrapper .comment-uk-football__contributor--amy-lawrence {
  -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
  filter: grayscale(100%); }
.comment-uk-football__link--barney-ronay:hover ~ .comment-uk-football__contributors__wrapper .comment-uk-football__contributor--barry-glendenning {
